original_text: You put just a seed into the ground. It might be wheat or it might be another kind of seed. You do not put into the ground the whole plant that the seed will become.
korean_text: 또 네가 뿌리는 것은 장래의 형체를 뿌리는 것이 아니요 다만 밀이나 다른 것의 알맹이 뿐이로되

sentences.original_text: You put just a seed into the ground.
or it might be another kind of seed.
You do not put into the ground the whole plant
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 온전한 식물을 땅에 넣지 않습니다
